text: Amana, good job on the practice.
You seem to be in good spirits.

Even during the last lesson,
the trainer praised me.

They said it was fun to watch me dance
and it made them feel lively too!
Maybe these shoes helped me out.

Haha, yeah...
But I don't think it's just that.

Amana, you prepared a lot for this training camp,
not just the shoes.

Wasn't it because you were thinking,
"Let's focus and get results"?

...With that mindset,
I think things are going smoothly.
Yeah, it's thanks to you, Amana.

You'll definitely grow a lot during this camp.
...I'm sure of it.
